import React, { Component } from 'react'; export default class About extends Component { render() { return ( {/*generated code*/}

hiya!

Coder by day, a designer on a full moon. Making user interaction and experience better one step at a time. Web development allows me to use my passion for technology and being able to be creative and build products that can be useful for people; turning an idea into reality. I care about user experience and figuring out what people enjoy on products.
